data.title: Catholic Colleges and Universities in the United States
data.meta_description: The following list represents degree-granting institutions of Catholic higher education in the United States. This list was compiled using data from the Cong...
data.text:
The following list represents degree-granting institutions of Catholic higher education in the United States. This list was compiled using data from the Congregation for Catholic Education (2005)[1], the Official Catholic Directory (2010)[2] and Diocesan Bishops[3].

LISTS: Alphabetical | Geographical

Geographical Map of Catholic Colleges and Universities

-->
